description: An optional object for `/credit/payroll_income/refresh` request options.

item_ids.description: An array of `item_id`s to be refreshed. Each `item_id` should uniquely identify a payroll income item. If this field is not provided, all `item_id`s associated with the `user_token` will be refreshed.

webhook.description: The URL where Plaid will send the payroll income refresh webhook.
